message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you our premium product at a special price of $12000. This is a great opportunity to get a high-value item at a competitive rate. Let me know if you're interested!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $9000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value.
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the lowest I can go is $11000 given the value and quality of the product. Let me know if this works for you!

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I'm still a bit short of my budget. I can offer $10000 for the product, which is the highest I'm willing to go. If we can't agree on this price, I'll have to consider other options.
